entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Peawanuck
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:58 AM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Partly Cloudy, -32.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Peawanuck Airport 05:00 AM CST Thursday 16 February 2023
Condition: Partly Cloudy
Temperature: -32.8°C
Pressure: 102.0 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 71 %
Wind Chill: -41
Dewpoint: -36.3°C

Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High minus 26.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind becoming west 20 km/h this morning. High minus 26. Wind chill minus 45 this morning and minus 34 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 30.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 30. Wind chill near minus 39. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow. High minus 16.
